Reviews.Title: Great computer, well worth the money
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Got this notebook for my 15 year old son. Great notebook! Fast, and easy to use. No problems with this.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core 2 Duo P8400 2.26GHZ
2GB DDR3 - 250GB (5400 rpm)
DVDRW - nVIDIA GeForce 9400M 256MB - 13.3" (1280x800) LED
802.11n - Bluetooth - iSight Webcam - Mac OS X 10.6 Snow Leopard
(2) USB 2.0 - (1) Mini DisplayPort - Combined optical digital output/headphone output
